front.title: IEEE Guide on the Measurement for the Performance of Aeolian Vibration Dampers for Single Conductors
front.abstract: Superseded by 664-1993. The current methodologies, including apparatus, procedures, and measurement accuracies, for determining the dynamic characteristics of vibration dampers and damping systems are described. Some basic guidance is provided regarding a given methodâ€™s strengths and weaknesses. The methodologies and procedures described are applicable to indoor testing only.
